desc: Get Immersed with ForceFeel! The Realteus ForceFeel is a new haptic gaming pad, designed with the latest driving and flight simulation games in mind. It places you in the middle of the action as you sense every bump, twist, and turn as you play.

layout.text: SENSE EVERY BUMP, TWIST, AND TURN AS YOU PLAY
With a brand-new haptic gaming pad, the Realteus seeks to intensify your immersion experience.
